short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use keyboard shortcuts to change video speed on demand.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change video speeds between 1x, 1.5x, and 2x with keyboard shortcuts. The video will transition speeds on a logarithmic scale ove the span of one second. The speed changes are fast and smooth.

Default shortcuts
Alt + X: 1x
Alt + C: 1.5x
Alt + V: 2x

You may change these shortcuts by going to chrome://extensions/shortcuts
